content.text:
<image 1> is Bi-sociation, Arthur Koestler (1964) model. Which of the options is not the concept of dual association suggested by Berk (2013)?

A. Defining the criteria for creativity
B. List the attributes of each unrelated concept independently
C. Evaluate different combinations of properties of two unrelated concepts
D. Look for areas that force fit these attributes and provide opportunities

The concept of dual association suggested by Berk (2013) involves combining unrelated concepts to generate creative ideas. The option that is not part of this concept is:

A. Defining the criteria for creativity

This option is more about establishing what constitutes creativity rather than the process of combining unrelated concepts.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
